20110110030549.000|20110110030550.000|CC1|>> Stahl: IT WASN'T THAT LONG   
20110110030550.000|20110110030551.000|CC1|AGO THAT, IF YOU WANTED TO      
20110110030551.000|20110110030553.000|CC1|GAMBLE, YOU HAD TO TRAVEL A LONG
20110110030553.000|20110110030555.000|CC1|WAY.                            
20110110030555.000|20110110030557.000|CC1|TODAY, TO SHOOT CRAPS OR PLAY   
20110110030557.000|20110110030559.000|CC1|SLOTS, ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS GET
20110110030559.000|20110110030601.000|CC1|IN YOUR CAR-- THERE'S PROBABLY A
20110110030601.000|20110110030603.000|CC1|CASINO IN YOUR STATE, OR RIGHT  
20110110030603.000|20110110030606.000|CC1|NEXT DOOR.                      
20110110030607.000|20110110030607.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 1:00:00
20110110030606.000|20110110030608.000|CC1|THERE ARE CASINOS NOW IN 38     
20110110030608.000|20110110030609.000|CC1|STATES, WHICH USE THE REVENUE   
20110110030609.000|20110110030612.000|CC1|FROM GAMBLING TO HELP SOLVE     
20110110030612.000|20110110030614.000|CC1|THEIR BLOATED BUDGET DEFICITS.  
20110110030614.000|20110110030616.000|CC1|THE MAIN ATTRACTION AT THESE    
20110110030616.000|20110110030619.000|CC1|CASINOS IS NOW THE NEW SLOT     
20110110030619.000|20110110030620.000|CC1|MACHINES.                       
20110110030620.000|20110110030621.000|CC1|THERE ARE CLOSE TO 850,000 OF   
20110110030621.000|20110110030622.000|CC1|THEM IN THE UNITED STATES--     
20110110030622.000|20110110030623.000|CC1|TWICE THE NUMBER OF ATMs.       
20110110030623.000|20110110030625.000|CC1|WE AMERICANS SPEND MORE MONEY ON
20110110030625.000|20110110030625.000|CC1|SLOTS THAN ON MOVIES, BASEBALL  
20110110030625.000|20110110030629.000|CC1|AND THEME PARKS COMBINED.       
20110110030629.000|20110110030631.000|CC1|BUT WITH THE MODERN SLOT        
20110110030631.000|20110110030633.000|CC1|MACHINES, THERE IS A GREATER    
20110110030633.000|20110110030634.000|CC1|POTENTIAL FOR A DANGEROUS SIDE  
20110110030634.000|20110110030635.000|CC1|EFFECT-- GAMBLING ADDICTION, AS 
20110110030635.000|20110110030636.000|CC1|MORE PEOPLE ARE ADDICTED TO     
20110110030636.000|20110110030639.000|CC1|SLOTS THAN ANY OTHER FORM OF    
20110110030639.000|20110110030642.000|CC1|GAMBLING.                       
20110110030642.000|20110110030645.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT SLOT MACHINES USED 
20110110030645.000|20110110030647.000|CC1|TO LOOK LIKE, WHERE YOU PULL THE
20110110030647.000|20110110030650.000|CC1|HANDLE AND HOPE FOR THREE OF A  
20110110030650.000|20110110030651.000|CC1|KIND.                           
20110110030651.000|20110110030655.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT THEY LOOK LIKE     
20110110030655.000|20110110030658.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110110030658.000|20110110030701.000|CC1|THE MODERN SLOTS ARE LIKE HIGH- 
20110110030701.000|20110110030702.000|CC1|TECH VIDEO GAMES THAT PLAY MUSIC
20110110030702.000|20110110030706.000|CC1|AND SCENES FROM TV SHOWS.       
20110110030706.000|20110110030707.000|CC1|YOU CAN PLAY HUNDREDS OF LINES  
20110110030707.000|20110110030709.000|CC1|AT ONCE, AND INSTEAD OF PULLING 
20110110030709.000|20110110030709.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:07:00 of 1:00:00
20110110030709.000|20110110030711.000|CC1|A HANDLE, YOU BET BY PUSHING    
20110110030711.000|20110110030713.000|CC1|BUTTONS, WHICH MEANS EACH BET   
20110110030713.000|20110110030714.000|CC1|CAN BE COMPLETED IN AS LITTLE AS
20110110030714.000|20110110030715.000|CC1|THREE AND A HALF SECONDS.       
20110110030715.000|20110110030717.000|CC1|IT LOOKS LIKE GREAT FUN, BUT IT 
20110110030717.000|20110110030721.000|CC1|CAN BE DANGEROUSLY ADDICTIVE.   
20110110030721.000|20110110030722.000|CC1|>> Natasha Schull: WHETHER OR   
20110110030722.000|20110110030724.000|CC1|NOT IT'S THEIR INTENTION, THE   
20110110030724.000|20110110030727.000|CC1|GAMBLING INDUSTRY IS DESIGNING  
20110110030727.000|20110110030729.000|CC1|MACHINES THAT CAN ADDICT PEOPLE.
20110110030729.000|20110110030730.000|CC1|>> Stahl: M.I.T. ANTHROPOLOGY   
20110110030730.000|20110110030732.000|CC1|PROFESSOR NATASHA SCHULL HAS    
20110110030732.000|20110110030733.000|CC1|STUDIED GAMBLING ADDICTION FOR  
20110110030733.000|20110110030735.000|CC1|OVER 15 YEARS.                  
20110110030735.000|20110110030736.000|CC1|SHE'S INTERVIEWED GAMBLERS,     
20110110030736.000|20110110030737.000|CC1|CASINO OWNERS, AND SLOT MACHINE 
20110110030737.000|20110110030739.000|CC1|DESIGNERS.                      
20110110030739.000|20110110030740.000|CC1|DO YOU THINK THAT MOST PEOPLE   
20110110030740.000|20110110030741.000|CC1|WOULD EVEN THINK THAT A MACHINE 
20110110030741.000|20110110030743.000|CC1|COULD ADDICT YOU?               
20110110030743.000|20110110030745.000|CC1|THAT A MACHINE COULD DO THE SAME
20110110030745.000|20110110030747.000|CC1|THING THAT A DRUG COULD?        
20110110030747.000|20110110030748.000|CC1|>> Schull: WHAT ADDICTION REALLY
20110110030748.000|20110110030750.000|CC1|HAS TO DO IS WITH THE SPEED OF  
20110110030750.000|20110110030751.000|CC1|REWARDS.                        
20110110030751.000|20110110030752.000|CC1|AND THESE MACHINES, IF THEY'RE  
20110110030752.000|20110110030753.000|CC1|PACKING 1,200 HANDS PER HOUR    
20110110030753.000|20110110030755.000|CC1|INTO PLAY, YOU'RE BEING         
20110110030755.000|20110110030759.000|CC1|EXPOSED... YOU COULD SEE THAT AS
20110110030759.000|20110110030805.000|CC1|BEING EXPOSED TO A HIGHER DOSE. 
20110110030805.000|20110110030807.000|CC1|>> Stahl: A HIGHER DOSE, SAYS   
20110110030807.000|20110110030808.000|CC1|SCHULL, BECAUSE ALL THAT SPEED  
20110110030808.000|20110110030808.000|CC1|MEANS MORE BETS, AND THAT MEANS 
20110110030814.000|20110110030814.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:08:00 of 1:00:00
20110110030808.000|20110110030816.000|CC1|MORE EXCITEMENT.                
20110110030816.000|20110110030818.000|CC1|AND NO MACHINE IS BETTER FOR    
20110110030818.000|20110110030819.000|CC1|THAT THAN THE PENNY SLOT, THE   
20110110030819.000|20110110030821.000|CC1|MOST POPULAR GAME ON THE CASINO 
20110110030821.000|20110110030823.000|CC1|FLOOR.                          
20110110030823.000|20110110030824.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE BETS ARE SMALL, YOU 
20110110030824.000|20110110030824.000|CC1|CAN PLACE HUNDREDS OF THEM AT A 
20110110030824.000|20110110030825.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110110030825.000|20110110030826.000|CC1|>> Schull: ANOTHER CORE ASPECT  
20110110030826.000|20110110030827.000|CC1|OF THE ADDICTIVENESS IS THEIR   
20110110030827.000|20110110030828.000|CC1|CONTINUOUS NATURE.              
20110110030828.000|20110110030829.000|CC1|YOU'RE NOT INTERRUPTED BY       
20110110030829.000|20110110030831.000|CC1|ANYTHING-- YOU'RE NOT WAITING   
20110110030831.000|20110110030832.000|CC1|FOR THE HORSES TO RUN, YOU'RE   
20110110030832.000|20110110030835.000|CC1|NOT WAITING FOR THE GUY NEXT TO 
20110110030835.000|20110110030836.000|CC1|YOU TO CHOOSE HIS CARD TO PUT   
20110110030836.000|20110110030837.000|CC1|DOWN, THERE'S NO ROULETTE WHEEL 
20110110030837.000|20110110030838.000|CC1|SPINNING.                       
20110110030838.000|20110110030840.000|CC1|IT'S JUST YOU AND THE MACHINE.  
20110110030840.000|20110110030840.000|CC1|IT'S A CONTINUOUS FLOW WITHOUT  
20110110030840.000|20110110030842.000|CC1|INTERRUPTION.                   
20110110030842.000|20110110030843.000|CC1|>> Sandi Hall: I FOUND THAT THE 
20110110030843.000|20110110030844.000|CC1|MACHINES WERE WONDERFUL.        
20110110030844.000|20110110030845.000|CC1|I LOVED THE EXCITEMENT.         
20110110030845.000|20110110030846.000|CC1|I LOVED THE PEOPLE, I LOVED THE 
20110110030846.000|20110110030847.000|CC1|CAMARADERIE, THE HIGH FIVES WHEN
20110110030847.000|20110110030848.000|CC1|YOU WIN.                        
20110110030848.000|20110110030850.000|CC1|IT WAS JUST VERY EXCITING.      
20110110030850.000|20110110030851.000|CC1|>> Stahl: SANDI HALL LIVES ONLY 
20110110030851.000|20110110030853.000|CC1|A SHORT DRIVE FROM THOUSANDS OF 
20110110030853.000|20110110030854.000|CC1|SLOT MACHINES IN RHODE ISLAND   
20110110030854.000|20110110030857.000|CC1|AND CONNECTICUT.                
20110110030857.000|20110110030858.000|CC1|MARRIED WITH TWO DAUGHTERS, SHE 
20110110030858.000|20110110030900.000|CC1|WORKED IN A BOOKSTORE, AND USED 
20110110030900.000|20110110030901.000|CC1|TO LOOK AT THE CASINOS AS AN    
20110110030901.000|20110110030904.000|CC1|ENTERTAINING BREAK.             
20110110030904.000|20110110030905.000|CC1|BUT EVENTUALLY, SHE WAS PLAYING 
20110110030905.000|20110110030907.000|CC1|SLOTS SO MUCH, SHE BURNED       
20110110030907.000|20110110030910.000|CC1|THROUGH HER RETIREMENT FUNDS.   
20110110030910.000|20110110030912.000|CC1|>> Hall: MY EVERY THOUGHT AND   
20110110030912.000|20110110030913.000|CC1|EVERY BEING, IF I WASN'T AT THE

20110110030921.000|20110110030924.000|CC1|TAKES YOUR HUMANITY.

20110110030926.000|20110110030927.000|CC1|YOURSELF YOU'RE NEVER GOING TO  
20110110030927.000|20110110030928.000|CC1|GO AGAIN, YOU'RE NEVER GOING TO 
20110110030928.000|20110110030930.000|CC1|DO IT AGAIN.

20110110030941.000|20110110030942.000|CC1|>> Marilyn Lancelot: LIES JUST  
20110110030942.000|20110110030942.000|CC1|MANUFACTURE THEMSELVES.         
20110110030942.000|20110110030943.000|CC1|YOU DIDN'T EVEN HAVE TO THINK   
20110110030943.000|20110110030946.000|CC1|ABOUT IT.                       
20110110030946.000|20110110030947.000|CC1|>> Stahl: MARILYN LANCELOT,     
20110110030947.000|20110110030948.000|CC1|ANOTHER SLOT ADDICT, ENDED UP   
20110110030948.000|20110110030950.000|CC1|EMBEZZLING OVER A QUARTER-      
20110110030950.000|20110110030951.000|CC1|MILLION DOLLARS FROM HER        
20110110030951.000|20110110030953.000|CC1|EMPLOYER IN PHOENIX, ARIZONA.   
20110110030953.000|20110110030954.000|CC1|>> Lancelot: MY DAUGHTERS LIVED 
20110110030954.000|20110110030958.000|CC1|WITHIN... TWO HOUSES AWAY.      
20110110030958.000|20110110031000.000|CC1|THEY DID NOT KNOW I WAS STEALING
20110110031000.000|20110110031001.000|CC1|MONEY OR GAMBLING, UNTIL ONE    
20110110031001.000|20110110031003.000|CC1|DAY, SEVEN POLICE CARS DROVE    
20110110031003.000|20110110031003.000|CC1|INTO MY YARD AND TOOK ME AWAY IN
20110110031003.000|20110110031005.000|CC1|HANDCUFFS.                      
20110110031005.000|20110110031006.000|CC1|THAT'S HOW THEY FOUND OUT.      
20110110031006.000|20110110031006.000|CC1|>> Stahl: HANDCUFFS?            
20110110031006.000|20110110031007.000|CC1|>> Lancelot: YEAH.              
20110110031007.000|20110110031009.000|CC1|>> Schull: THIS IS GAMBLING FOR 
20110110031009.000|20110110031010.000|CC1|GAMBLING'S SAKE, AND THE AIM IS 
20110110031010.000|20110110031013.000|CC1|NOT TO WIN A JACKPOT.

20110110031035.000|20110110031037.000|CC1|>> Stahl: RESEARCHERS AT THE

20110110031044.000|20110110031045.000|CC1|MACHINES CAN MAKE THEM THINK

20110110031053.000|20110110031055.000|CC1|A DOLLAR, HE MIGHT GET BACK 50

20110110032312.000|20110110032313.000|CC1|HE WAS A DREAMER, I THINK.      
20110110032313.000|20110110032314.000|CC1|>> Pitts: A DREAMER, YOUR       
20110110032314.000|20110110032315.000|CC1|HUSBAND?                        
20110110032315.000|20110110032318.000|CC1|WHAT DID HE DREAM FOR SANTIAGO? 
20110110032318.000|20110110032320.000|CC1|>> Cavazos: A PERFECT PLACE FOR 
20110110032320.000|20110110032321.000|CC1|HIS KIDS.                       
20110110032321.000|20110110032322.000|CC1|>> Pitts: SANTIAGO DATES BACK TO
20110110032322.000|20110110032325.000|CC1|THE 1600s.                      
20110110032325.000|20110110032326.000|CC1|ITS HISTORY AND NATURAL SETTING 
20110110032326.000|20110110032328.000|CC1|MAKE IT A POPULAR TOURIST       
20110110032328.000|20110110032330.000|CC1|DESTINATION.                    
20110110032330.000|20110110032331.000|CC1|BUT BENEATH THE POSTCARD        
20110110032331.000|20110110032332.000|CC1|APPEARANCE IS ANOTHER SANTIAGO, 
20110110032332.000|20110110032333.000|CC1|A PLACE IMPORTANT TO DRUG       
20110110032333.000|20110110032337.000|CC1|TRAFFICKERS.                    
20110110032337.000|20110110032338.000|CC1|THE TOWN STRADDLES THE MAJOR    
20110110032338.000|20110110032340.000|CC1|HIGHWAY FROM THE DRUG PRODUCING 
20110110032340.000|20110110032340.000|CC1|REGIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO AND  
20110110032340.000|20110110032343.000|CC1|SOUTH AMERICA.                  
20110110032343.000|20110110032345.000|CC1|CONTROLLING SANTIAGO MAKES IT   
20110110032345.000|20110110032348.000|CC1|EASIER TO MOVE SHIPMENTS NORTH  
20110110032348.000|20110110032349.000|CC1|TO MONTERREY.                   
20110110032349.000|20110110032351.000|CC1|FROM THERE, THE MARIJUANA,      
20110110032351.000|20110110032352.000|CC1|COCAINE, HEROIN AND             
20110110032352.000|20110110032353.000|CC1|METHAMPHETAMINES ARE SHIPPED TO 
20110110032353.000|20110110032355.000|CC1|CITIES ON THE BORDER THREE HOURS
20110110032355.000|20110110032356.000|CC1|AWAY, AND SMUGGLED INTO THE     
20110110032356.000|20110110032358.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110110032358.000|20110110032358.000|CC1|>> Ramon Garza: SO FROM THAT
